meanings.definition: A large metropolitan area that consists of several cities and their surrounding suburbs.
meanings.sent1: The bustling metroplex was filled with tall buildings and busy streets.
meanings.sent2: People from different cities in the metroplex come together for events and activities.
meanings.sent3: The metroplex decided to throw a party for all its neighborhoods, and it was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: In the vast metroplex of dreams, every street led to a different possibility.
meanings.sent5: The lights of the metroplex at night created a beautiful sight for all to see.

meanings.definition: The Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex in Texas is one of the largest in the United States.
meanings.sent1: Living in the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex means having access to many different cultural experiences.
meanings.sent2: Businesses in the metroplex contribute to the economy of the entire region.
meanings.sent3: When the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex sneezes, the whole state catches a cold - or so they say!
meanings.sent4: The Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex stood as a beacon of opportunity for those seeking a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex felt like embarking on a grand adventure.
